heading: HR01618
0: RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE SECRETARY OF DEPARTMENT OF TRADE AND INDUSTRY (DTI), SEC. RAMON M. LOPEZ, TO DEVISE A DETAILED MECHANISM TO EFFECTUATE A SYSTEMATIZED COORDINATION AMONG ALL THE DISTRICT REPRESENTATIVES OF NORTH LUZON, AS WELL AS, AN EFFECTIVE INFORMATION DISSEMINATION WITH RESPECT TO DTI's ENVISIONED "ROLL-IT-PROGRAM" AND SUCH OTHER PROGRAMS/PROJECTS THAT WILL BOOST THE GROWTH OF DOMESTIC AND FOREIGN INVESTMENTS
